actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code to limit the authority of the Secretary of Defense with regard to functions and powers within the Department of Defense.

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of Defense from assigning, consolidating, or abolishing functions, power, or duties vested in the Department of Defense except where such an action would improve the administration or operation of the Department or with regard to the development and operational use of new weapons or weapons systems.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code to limit the authority of the Secretary of Defense with regard to functions and powers within the Department of Defense.
